title: GOD USOPP! One Piece Episode 113, 114 & 115 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A combined reaction and review covering episodes 113-115, focusing on Usopp and Chopper's battle against Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, and the development of Usopp's character.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through episode 115 of the Arabasta Arc

title: Episode 113 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page detailing Episode 113's plot, characters, Devil Fruits, and production information.

title: Mogu Mogu no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed information about Miss Merry Christmas's Mole-Mole Devil Fruit, including its abilities, strengths, and weaknesses.

title: Lassoo - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Information about Lassoo, the first inanimate object shown to have eaten a Devil Fruit, including details about the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Lassoo's abilities and role in the battle

title: Karoo - One Piece Wiki

description: Character page for Karoo, Vivi's loyal duck companion and captain of the Duck Squad, highlighting his heroic moments throughout the series.

title: Usopp and Chopper vs Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas
author: Animated Battles Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed breakdown of the battle between Usopp and Chopper against Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, covering episodes 113-115.
